attributes.action: To stop the Eu changes our driving laws (miles to kilometers)and forcing retests.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Eu is bad for britain We never signed up for this eu rubbish the way its turned out ,They our trying to make us more european and in the future they will try and change from driving in miles to kilos and force every driver to take a retest.Sign now to save the way we drive.We have the safest road in Eu they should learn from us.They may even make us drive on the left.This year the will make every lvg driver take a retest every five years,next it will be your car.Stop the eu now before it to late.
